original_text: And Abishai the brother of Joab, he was chief of the three: for lifting up his spear against three hundred, he slew them, and had a name among the three.
korean_text: 요압의 아우 아비새는 그 세 명 중 우두머리라 그가 창을 휘둘러 삼백 명을 죽이고 그 세 명 가운데에 이름을 얻었으니

sentences.original_text: he was chief of the three
for lifting up his spear against three hundred
sentences.korean_translation: 세 백 명을 치려고 창을 든 일로

sentences.original_text: and had a name among the three
